name: Dino Dodgers!
description:
**How to Play**

1) Scroll your mouse to move your dino character

2) Dodge the enemy balls & avoid being hit by them

The game ends when you are hit by an enemy ball. To play again, click the 'Restart' button on the Game Over screen.

Game created using Scratch programming language & open source free art & music assets. 

Credits (Art/Music assets):

https://tallbeard.itch.io/three-red-hearts-prepare-to-dev
